metadata.title: CVE-2022-46836 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PHP code injection in watolib auth.php and hosttags.php in Tribe29'sCheckmk <= 2.1.0p10, Checkmk <= 2.0.0p27, and Checkmk <= 1.6.0p29 allows anattacker to inject and execute PHP code which will be executed upon requestof the vulnerable component.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
